data.title: Office of Institutional Compliance & Enterprise Risk Management
data.text:
Welcome! The Office of Enterprise Risk Management (ERM) coordinates the University’s enterprise risk management efforts, privacy, and insurance programs.

ERM provides a framework and processes for the identification, assessment, ownership, response, monitoring and assurance of risk/opportunities at the University.

The Office of ERM also has primary responsibility for negotiating and ensuring the sufficiency of the University’s insurance portfolio, overseeing insurance claims, and developing various risk and loss control programs.

In the privacy realm, ERM provides oversight and guidance on the privacy of personal information collected by the University.

Members of the Yale community are encouraged to contact the Office of ERM with any questions or concerns related to proposed activities with respect to loss prevention, life safety, premises liability, automobile liability, worker’s compensation, claims recovery, or any risk-related matters. The Privacy Office is available on matters related to the protection of personal information.
